A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was a great movie! I don't know why every butt hurt fan is all upset that they changed things that tends to happen in franchises that last this long! Yes it had it's flaws and certain things that I didn't like. But over all as a whole I thought it was great and nowhere near the prequels like a lot of fans are saying. would definitely reccomend going out to watch!
